author: Matt Alinafe
title: Venmo and MoonPay Join Forces to Introduce Crypto to 60 Million Users
text: Latest news about Bitcoin and all cryptocurrencies. Your daily crypto news habit. - Venmo partners with MoonPay, enabling seamless crypto transactions for over 60 million users. - Integration expands digital asset use in America, boosting crypto adoption. - MoonPay continues its mission to introduce cryptocurrencies to the next billion people by 2030. Recently, Venmo – the U.S.-based peer-to-peer payment app has recently partnered with MoonPay in a development that can have a significant impact on the crypto market. The deal allows MoonPay customers to link Venmo accounts to the app, and use their balance to enjoy the application’s several payment options. Also, this partnership allows for seamless cryptocurrency transactions in an app that reaches over 60 million users. [Breaking News: Venmo's 60 million users in the U.S. can now buy crypto using MoonPay!][This new integration lets you buy all your favorite cryptocurrencies using your Venmo balance.][Live now and rolling out soon to the MoonPay partner network.][pic.twitter.com/VoUjMCbOcS]— MoonPay [(@moonpay)][October 17, 2024] This integration allows for even more widespread use of digital assets in America. The country already accounts for 22.3% of the global crypto activity – and by adding a way for Venmo users to quickly buy and sell crypto – they can tap into the expanding digital economy with greater ease and efficiency. What is MoonPay? MoonPay is a FinTech kickstarted in 2019 that provides payment infrastructure for cryptocurrencies and NFTs. The company is available in over 180 countries and its services cover the most popular payment methods including Apple Pay and Google Pay. With the Venmo partnership – MoonPay continues to expand its reach to fulfill its plan of introducing cryptocurrencies to the next 1 billion people by 2030. Earlier this year the company set up a similar partnership with digital payment provider PayPal. MoonPay Partnering With Ripple The news comes just a few days after the company announced yet another partnership with Ripple. Now, people in 180+ countries can easily buy, store, and manage XRP using the mobile app. This development followed Ripple’s announcement of MoonPay as a designated partner ahead of the launch of the RLUSD stablecoin. Despite Ripple’s ongoing [legal battle with the SEC](https://www.bitcoinsensus.com/news/missed-appeal-deadline-threatens-secs-case-against-ripple/). – the partnership demonstrates confidence in XRP’s future and follows MoonPay’s belief in widespread crypto adoption. title: 福建省国家级育繁推一体化种子企业数量增至6家-国际在线
text:
原标题：我省国家级育繁推一体化种子企业数量增至6家
　　7月30日，我省种子企业万农高科集团有限公司获颁农作物种子生产经营许可证（A证）。这是今年以来，省农业农村厅发出的第3张A证。至此，全省国家级育繁推一体化种子企业数量增至6家。
　　国家级育繁推一体化种子企业，应持有农作物种子生产经营许可证（A证），实行选育生产经营相结合，有效区域为全国。它们以农作物种子生产经营为主业，具有科研育种能力强、生产经营规模大、生产经营行为规范等特征与优势。
　　据悉，在较长一段时间里，我省仅有科荟种业股份有限公司、农友种苗（中国）有限公司2家国家级育繁推一体化种子企业。去年以来，永富农业科技有限公司、厦门华泰五谷种苗公司、福建六三种业有限责任公司、万农高科集团有限公司先后获颁农作物种子生产经营许可证（A证）。
　　“育繁推一体化，是种子企业综合实力的重要体现。A证种子企业是我省种业领域的头雁企业，引领我省种业发展，是我们重点培育支持的对象。”省种子总站站长赵杰樑说。（记者 张辉）

author: Jesús Lastra
title: Bridgestone cita el martes a los sindicatos para anunciar recortes
text:
Secciones
Servicios
Destacamos
Los sindicatos con representación en las fábricas de Bridgestone en España ya tienen noticias de la multinacional, que finalmente anuló la reunión prevista para el ... pasado martes ante el enfado de la representación social por la falta de concreción de los recortes que la organización contempla para las plantas de Basauri y Puente San Miguel.
Será el próximo martes, 1 de abril, cuando la compañía ponga negro sobre blanco el efecto del retroceso en las ventas europeas en los últimos años, tal y como ha venido lamentando en las reuniones de seguimiento mantenidas con los sindicatos –CC OO, UGT, BUB, SITB y ELA– en estas últimas semanas.
Dichos encuentros, promovidos por los representantes de los trabajadores respecto al rumbo de Bridgestone una vez termine el Expediente de Regulación de Empleo (ERTE) que finaliza el lunes, no han arrojado mayor detalle sobre potenciales recortes, pues la organización se ha enrocado en su discurso de analizar si la situación requiere medidas coyunturales (nuevo ERTE) o estructurales, esto es, despidos. El planteamiento de los directivos, así como la aportación de diagnósticos de consultoras y la asistencia a los encuentros de abogados especializados en reestructuraciones hace pensar al comité de empresa que los despidos serán la vía por la que Bridgestone trate de adaptar su capacidad productiva.
Las fábricas en el foco son las de Puente San Miguel y Basauri. En la instalación cántabra trabajan a día de hoy 418 empleados y está especializada en neumáticos agrícolas y de camión, precisamente los segmentos más golpeados por el mercado en los últimos años.
Sin ir más lejos, casi 400 personas se concentraron el pasado el 18 de marzo para defender el futuro de sus puestos de trabajo y reclamar a la empresa soluciones que permitieran sortear las turbulencias actuales para el sector.
Se da la circunstancia de que el martes, mientras los sindicatos conocen los planes de Bridgestone, todos los trabajadores en teoría deberán acudir a sus puestos de trabajo dado que el ERTE ya no estará en vigor. Durante el tiempo que ha permanecido activo este ajuste temporal, que se ha venido prorrogando, la media de jornadas trabajadas al mes ronda los 13 días.

author: Jacky
title: Half of police forces not investigating crime properly
text:
Responding to the data, a Home Office source said ministers expected a “zero tolerance” approach to all crimes committed by police, with forces agreeing in September to pursue “all lines of investigation for all crimes.” , without exception”.
The source said: “Since March, there have been record numbers of police and more than £500m extra has been invested. “These additional resources should result in a significant increase in the number of crimes solved.”
The figures emerge from the Telegraph’s analysis of the results of inspections of all 43 forces in 2021/22 against eight criteria.
Forces are rated on metrics including looking after their workforce, offering good value for money and treating the public with respect, but when judged solely on crime investigation, ratings fall.
They scored worse on these metrics than on other criteria such as crime prevention, treating the public with fairness and respect, and value for money.
No force was rated “outstanding” in either investigating crime or responding to the public. Outstanding is the top level of five levels of performance, which then range from good, adequate, requiring improvement, and inadequate.
Three forces were deemed inadequate to investigate crimes and 19 of them were judged to “require improvement”. Eight were assessed as “inadequate” in their response to the public, and another 17 “required improvement.”
The Telegraph’s analysis was based on inspections from 2021/22, covering all 43 forces over the same period to allow a fair comparison. The actions of five forces – the Metropolitan Police, West Midlands, Devon and Cornwall, Staffordshire and Wiltshire – are so worrying that they are currently under special measures.

title: 强对流天气黄色预警：江西北部等地局地不排除出现龙卷可能性|江西省_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
新京报讯 据中央气象台网站消息，中央气象台5月8日06时升级发布强对流天气黄色预警：
预计5月8日08时至9日08时，吉林西部、内蒙古东部、山西北部、河北北部、北京西部山区、陕西南部、江苏南部、安徽南部、湖北东部、湖南东部和西南部、江西中北部、广西北部等地的部分地区将有8级以上雷暴大风或冰雹天气，其中，安徽西南部、湖北东部、湖南东部、江西中北部、广西东北部等地的部分地区将有10级以上雷暴大风，最大风力可达11级以上，江西北部等地局地不排除出现龙卷的可能性；吉林西北部、河北东部和南部、山西西北部、河南南部、安徽中南部、江苏中南部、浙江中西部、湖北中东部、福建西北部、江西、湖南、贵州东南部、广西中北部、广东西北部等地的部分地区将有小时雨量大于20毫米的短时强降水天气，其中，湖南中南部、江西中北部、浙江西部、福建西北部、广西北部等地的部分地区小时雨量大于50毫米，最大可达80毫米以上。
预计，强对流的主要影响时段为今天白天至夜间。
防御指南：
1.政府及相关部门按照职责做好防短时暴雨、防雷、防大风应急防御工作，气象部门做好人工防雹作业准备并择机进行作业；
2.驾驶员通过积水路段应减速慢行确认安全后再通过，交管部门应当根据路况在强降雨路段和积水路段采取交通管制措施和交通引导；
3.户外人员应减少或暂停空旷地方的户外作业，选择进入抗风能力较强并具有防雷措施的建筑内，同时关闭门窗远离危险电源；
4.机场、铁路、高速公路和水上交通等单位应采取限飞、限速或暂时关闭等措施保障人员和交通安全，相关水域水上作业和过往船舶应回港规避，加固港口设施；
5.检查城市、农田、鱼塘排水系统，做好必要的排涝措施和对山洪、滑坡、泥石流等灾害的防御准备。

author: Reuters
title: Samsung labour strike puts spotlight on politically-backed worker group | Company News - Business Standard
text: A labour strike in India that has disrupted production at a Samsung plant has put the spotlight on a politically-backed worker group which quietly mobilized employees of the South Korean company and now plans to extend its efforts in the country's electronics sector.The Samsung protests over low wages, now in their fifth day, cast a shadow on Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi's plan of courting foreign investors to "Make in India" and tripling electronics production to $500 billion in six years.From Foxconn to Micron, companies have been lured to more business friendly policies and cheap labour under Modi's decade-long rule, especially as foreign manufacturing giants look to diversify their supply chains beyond the powerhouse of China.On Friday, hundreds of protesting workers wearing blue-coloured Samsung shirts continued to sit inside makeshift tents near the home appliances plant in southern state of Tamil Nadu, sporting red caps with the acronym CITU.The Centre of Indian Trade Unions (CITU) is backed by India's most influential hard-left political party and has 6.6 million worker members. It demands worker-friendly measures, though it has historically focused more on auto sectors and companies like Hyundai.While employees at companies like Samsung can unionize on their own, partnering with groups like CITU, which was started in 1970, is seen by some workers as a way to garner more national support and get their voice better heard by companies.With the Samsung strike, CITU is now planning to make inroads into the electronics manufacturing sector which is growing at a rapid pace but where companies "are not doing wage revisions properly," said S Kannan, its Tamil Nadu deputy general secretary."There is no opportunity for collective bargaining either," he added.A strike of this scale - which impacts production - is not common in India's electronics industry. Previous notable ones include worker unrests at iPhone factories of suppliers Wistron and Foxconn during 2021, where unpaid wages and a food poisoning incident were triggers, respectively.CITU has plans to push for more worker rights at Apple supplier Flex and electronics firm Sanmina where it has been in talks with the management for demands including union recognition and better wages, Kannan said.Flex in a statement said it upholds highest global standards for labor practices and believe in a respectful and collaborative environment.The prime minister's office, the federal IT ministry, the Tamil Nadu labor ministry, and Sanmina did not respond to Reuters queries.DIRE SITUATIONThe Samsung strike is one of biggest industrial unrests to have caused production disruptions at a foreign multinational company. The plant alone accounts for around a third of its annual $12 billion India revenue.While workers protest, Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M.K. Stalin has been on a U.S. tour since late August and held talks with companies such as Nike and Ford.In Samsung's case, the CITU privately wrote a letter in July - seen by Reuters - asking the its management for higher wages for workers who it said were forced into a "dire situation".When the company didn't agree, CITU supported workers to start a strike this week, which is also serving as a challenge to companies the group says pay low wages to poor workers.Samsung workers are earning 25,000 rupees ($300) on average per month, CITU said, and they are demanding a raise of 36,000 rupees ($430) over three years. One worker outside the plant said he joined Samsung a decade ago and makes only 23,000 rupees a month, which made life difficult with soaring living costs."Instances of strikes could be reduced if government ensures a mechanism for multinationals to respect the labour laws including freedom of association and collective bargaining," said K.R. Shyam Sundar, an economist who has written on labour reforms in India.In a statement on Friday, Samsung said it has initiated discussions with its workers at the Chennai plant "to resolve all issues at the earliest.".storycontent div {margin:10px 0;}

title: RIIZE Tops Melon Hot 100 And iTunes Charts Around The World With “Love 119”
text: RIIZE Tops Melon Hot 100 And iTunes Charts Around The World With “Love 119” RIIZE’s latest comeback is off to a promising start! On January 5 at 6 p.m KST, RIIZE made their highly-anticipated return with their new single “ [Love 119](https://www.soompi.com/article/1634508wpp/watch-riize-gears-up-for-new-single-love-119-with-mv-teaser).” Shortly after its release, “Love 119” soared to the top of various domestic realtime charts in Korea, including Melon’s Hot 100 (for songs released within the last 30 days), Bugs, and Vibe. “Love 119” also reached No. 1 on Line Music’s realtime Top 100 chart in Japan, as well as iTunes charts in various countries around the world. By 10 a.m. KST on January 6, “Love 119” had already hit No. 1 on iTunes Top Songs charts in at least nine different regions including Thailand, Peru, Indonesia, Chile, Vietnam, Colombia, Malaysia, Mongolia, and the Philippines. The single also entered the top 10 in 16 different regions including Japan, Brazil, Norway, Taiwan, Hungary, Singapore, and Uzbekistan. In addition to RIIZE’s cinematic music video for “Love 119” (which you can check out [here](https://www.soompi.com/article/1634508wpp/watch-riize-gears-up-for-new-single-love-119-with-mv-teaser)), the group will be releasing a performance video for the song on January 6 at 6 p.m. KST on their official YouTube channel.
